argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ax1cn | |- 1 e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_mulid2 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( 1 x. x ) = x ) |
| 3 |  | #P_mulid1 | |- ( x e. CC -> ( x x. 1 ) = x ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_jca | |- ( x e. CC -> ( ( 1 x. x ) = x /\ ( x x. 1 ) = x ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_rgen | |- A. x e. CC ( ( 1 x. x ) = x /\ ( x x. 1 ) = x ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( 1 e. CC /\ A. x e. CC ( ( 1 x. x ) = x /\ ( x x. 1 ) = x ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 8 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 9 |  | #P_cnfldmul | |- x. = ( .r ` CCfld ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` CCfld ) = ( 1r ` CCfld ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_isringid | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> ( ( 1 e. CC /\ A. x e. CC ( ( 1 x. x ) = x /\ ( x x. 1 ) = x ) ) <-> ( 1r ` CCfld ) = 1 ) ) |
| 12 | 7, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( 1 e. CC /\ A. x e. CC ( ( 1 x. x ) = x /\ ( x x. 1 ) = x ) ) <-> ( 1r ` CCfld ) = 1 ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_mpbi | |- ( 1r ` CCfld ) = 1 |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eqcomi | |- 1 = ( 1r ` CCfld ) |
